meta.job_title: RN Float Pool Med Surg PRN

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acute care nursing in a med-surgical setting for various patients.
Obtain and maintain required cardiac life support certifications within 30 days of employment.
Work in a tertiary referral center, providing comprehensive diagnostic and treatment services.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to ensure quality patient care and positive outcomes.
Participate in programs and initiatives to support the care and improvement of human life.
Ensure compliance with nursing standards and regulations.
Contribute to a multi-disciplinary approach to patient care.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nursing or Associate Degree
Registered Nurse Texas License or Compact State License
